home.name: title
home.content: What Is the Ideal Length for Meta Title? The ideal length for the meta title is 50 and 60 characters.

home.name: description
home.content: Meta descriptions can technically be any length, but Google generally truncates snippets to ~155-160 characters. It's best to keep meta descriptions long enough that they're sufficiently descriptive, so we recommend descriptions between 50 and 160 characters.
